name: Healing Waves
description:
Keep your group and yourself alive in this action Roguelite.

Click on teammates bars to use Healing Hand or add Renew Aura.

Use "1" button to use Healing Wave.

You can check the spell's description on mouse over on the bottom of the game.

Don't run out of mana. You can check your mana in your healer bar.

Spells:

Healing HandHeals the target Unit with left-click.Renew AuraAdds an over time healing buff with right-click.Healing WaveHeal all ally units with "1" button.

Upgrading spells makes them stronger but they cost more mana.

Unfortunately, I didn't have time to add sound effects.
